dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.struct.evt.ent.PolicyEventComposite
dataStructure.description:
This is a base class that represents the occurrence of a composite event. A composite event is an event that is made up of a set of PolicyEventAtomic and/or PolicyEventComposite entities. Like a PolicyEventAtomic, a PolicyEventComposite can also be used to trigger the evaluation of the condition clause of a PolicyRule.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicyEventComposite

child.name: policyEvent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association HasPolicyEvents

This association end is optional
child.label: policyEvent
